item.title: 395 - Longest Substring with At Least K Repeating Characters
item.description: leetcode Problem Find the length of the longest substring T of a given string (consists of lowercase letters only) such that every character in T appears no less than k times. Example 1: Input: s = "aaabb", k = 3 Output: 3 The longest substring is "aaa", as 'a' is repeated 3 times. Example 2: Input: s = "ababbc", k = 2 Output: 5 The longest substring is "ababb", as 'a' is repeated 2 times and 'b' is repeated 3 times Solution class Solution: def longestSubstring(self, s: str, k: int) -> int: c = Counter(s) for i, v in c.
